item.title: Retrograde - o b i o [chillsynth]
item.dc:creator: sn.ow.y
item.description:
This is a really awesome track! I’m assuming you’ve recently started making synthwave/chillwave tracks recently, and if so, you’re off to a great start. I think my only advice (out of personal preference) would be to reduce the tempo slightly and to add more volume to your drums, mostly the snares. IMO, the best way to do this is to layer another snare from nu disco dynamite and add some reverb/delay. There’s a lot of really great vintage sounding snares in organic elements 2 near the 50s and also in the vintage snares section of snare drum collection. You can find a lot of gems by digging through those packs!

Read full topic
